dialogue.speaker: Hero
dialogue.line: I will never ever be as Ugly as you are mister toad man

dialogue.speaker: Villain
dialogue.line: Mohahahaha, you think I want to be as tiny and sprawny like you?!

dialogue.speaker: Hero
dialogue.line: At least I have a face and not only warts all over!

dialogue.speaker: Villain
dialogue.line: Hey, that actually hurts man, really uneccessary!

dialogue.speaker: Hero
dialogue.line: I will kill you for your Ugliness!
